## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 30,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | Current stock + player's planned purchase + recommended order size covers 5 days of forecasted demand with a 10% buffer. This approach accounts for demand variability and ensures sufficient inventory to meet sales for the next 5 days, while considering a potential discount opportunity. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | 10,000 units higher than the player's planned purchase, accounting for potential demand variability. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 4.3 days                                |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5.5 days                                |
| Comments                          | Ordering multiple vendor units of 30,000 units, while considering the player's planned purchase, ensures optimal stock level and avoids potential stockouts. |
